items.title: Microsoft says it mitigated a 15.7 Tbps DDoS from the Aisuru botnet on a single Australian Azure endpoint in October, the largest cloud DDoS ever recorded (Pierluigi Paganini/Security Affairs)
items.summary:
Pierluigi Paganini / Security Affairs:
Microsoft says it mitigated a 15.7 Tbps DDoS from the Aisuru botnet on a single Australian Azure endpoint in October, the largest cloud DDoS ever recorded  —  Microsoft says the Aisuru botnet launched a 15.7 Tbps DDoS on Azure from 500k IPs, using massive UDP floods peaking at 3.6 B pps.

Among the three massage guns in this lineup, things start with the TheraGun Mini 3 at $169.99 shipped, after using the exclusive code 9TO5THER50 at checkout. Outside of discounts, you’d be paying $220 for this massager at full price, which we’ve mostly seen keep above $190 over the year, save for occasional drops lower to $179, $170, $169, and the one-time $168 low we saw during last month’s Prime Day event. The exclusive deal here gives you a total $50 markdown off the going rate, landing it at the third-best price we have tracked – just $2 above that one-time low. Head below to check out the full lineup of exclusive massagers, face masks, and more.
